title: Faker's Affair
alternative_title: Fakers' Affair ; Faker's Affair ; Fakers' Affair After Story ; Faker's Affair After Story ; The Mamirou!! ; ザマアミロ!!
status: Fakers' Affair ; Faker's Affair ; Fakers' Affair After Story ; Faker's Affair After Story ; The Mamirou!! ; ザマアミロ!!
description:
Description :
        When the nerdy and dull Ichinose Yuuya fell in love with the most popular guy at school, Hinata Ryuuji, he thought that he would be okay just to be near Ryuuji. But one day, he decided to confess.

"I like you!"
"I'm sorry...but I'm really happy."

After this confession, Yuuya transferred to another school and lost contact with Ryuuji. Then, they met again at university, but Yuuya was like a completely different person...!?

2 volumes and 1 extra "After Story" which contains the epilogue and ending to this story!
